sentences.english: Objective To improve the understanding of the radioactive charcteristics of vertebral eosinophilic granuloma.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了提高對脊椎骨嗜酸性肉芽腫的認識。

sentences.english: Lengthen the tailbone away from the back of your pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 拉長尾椎骨遠離盆骨的後側。

sentences.english: The team found that the key appears to be joints in the bony vertebrae that wrap protectively around the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊發現起關鍵作用的是包圍脊索的脊椎骨關節。

sentences.english: The treatment with strontium ranelate reduces the risk of new fracture in vertebral and non-vertebral.
sentences.chinese: 雷奈酸鍶可降低椎骨以及非椎骨新發骨折的危險性。

sentences.english: The treatment with strontium ranelate reduces the risk of new fracture in vertebral and non-vertebral.
sentences.chinese: 雷奈酸鍶可降低椎骨以及非椎骨新發骨折的危險性。

sentences.english: A mouse has the same number of neck vertebrae as a giraffe .
sentences.chinese: 老鼠和長頸鹿的頸椎骨數目相同。

sentences.english: She suffered facial bruising and a fractured vertebra in the attack.
sentences.chinese: 在那次襲擊中她臉部擦傷，椎骨破裂。

sentences.english: The coccyx is the remnant of what was once a human tail.
sentences.chinese: 尾椎骨是我們曾經有的那條長尾巴的遺蹟。

sentences.english: She also writhes around in the shower with her vertebrae popping out of her back.
sentences.chinese: 她也繞着淋浴下痛苦地扭動蹦出後背的脊椎骨。

sentences.english: Keeping the spine flexible is the key to maintaining a youthful body.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎骨的柔軟度越高，越能保持身體年輕。

sentences.english: Then inhale and lift the torso up by pulling the tailbone down and into the pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 然後吸氣，通過拉尾椎骨進入盆骨的方式擡起軀幹。

sentences.english: Well, the spine is made of twenty-nine vertebrae and the tailbone.
sentences.chinese: 因爲脊椎由29塊椎骨和一塊尾骨組成。

sentences.english: Congenital vertebral anomalies include alterations of the shape and number of vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 先天性脊柱畸形包括各種脊椎骨的變形。

sentences.english: Smiling, I flow into his veins, and his spine.
sentences.chinese: 微笑着，我流入他的靜脈，和脊椎骨。

sentences.english: Treat ache of long - term knee joint and end vertebra how effectively to get injured by fall?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣有效治療長期膝關節疼痛和尾椎骨跌傷？

sentences.english: Good posture contributes to the health of your spine.
sentences.chinese: 好的體態關係到你脊椎骨的健康。

definition: thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
sacrum (bone at the base of the spine)
